location: Fugang Street, Nangang District, near Nangang Exhibition Center MRT
notes: This is NOT a residential apartment - it is a commercial/retail space (店面) on 1F with basement, registered as general retail. Listed uses include warehouse, office, nail salon, light food, and retail. The space is described as undecorated/raw condition. Completely unsuitable for a family with a baby - it is a commercial storefront, not a living space.
